name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Frontend Engineer, I possess 9 years of experience in leveraging **React**, **Redux**, **JavaScript**, **Node**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **TypeScript** to design and build scalable, high-performance applications. I am proficient in developing **Micro Frontend** architectures and creating reusable **UI components** while adhering to Object-Oriented JavaScript principles. I have a proven track record in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring junior engineers, and delivering innovative projects that enhance user experience and accessibility.
